full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS GSANG BA'I BDAG PO DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I RJES GNANG BSKUR TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS GSANG BA'I BDAG PO DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I RJES GNANG BSKUR TSUL 'DI NI, DAD DANG LDAN PA GUNG PI LIG THU CHOS RJE BLO GSAL GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^AEL LA GOG SANG @017B MER GEN PAndITAS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD TSUL KHRIMS RNAM PAR DAG PA BSRUNG BA SOGS LA BRTEN NAS, RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU 'THOB PAR GYUR CIG , BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
author_simple: AEL LA GOG SANG MER GEN PAndITA,
